title: Amazon KDP Keyword Research Helium 10 Tutorial - Steal Your Competitors Keywords, Low & No Content
description:
Find out how to steal your competitors keywords and analyse their keyword strategy by using the Helium 10 software. Keywords research for your Amazon KDP Low Content book is one of the most important parts of creating a successful book on Amazon - successful meaning, making sales!

🌟  Helium 10 🌟  
https://myfreedomempire.com/helium10
Use Coupon MYFREEDOMEMPIRE50 for 50% off your first month!
🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

In this video, I show you the power of Helium 10 and how you can use it to find out what keywords your competitors are ranking for so that you can start to develop your own keyword strategy for your low and no content books.
